name: Multi-factor Authentication option hidden in Profile Settings when disabled

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Cypress Reports: STABLE - TM4J-Key-Mapped-In-Cypress-Stable - TM4J key found Cypress master-prod run report (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
Multi-factor Authentication
————————————————————————————
1. Set "Enable Multi-factor Authentication" to false
2. Save
3. Switch back to a team, and observe the Profile Settings > Security tab
inline.expectedResult: Setting is saved. Under Profile Settings > Security, the Multifactor Authentication setting should not appear.
